Text

Paragraphs

This is lead text, typically going at the beginning of a page and one paragraph long. If more than one paragraph is tagged lead, it dilutes it's impact. Use sparsely.

I am a bunch of text some of it bold, some of me linked, some of me coded.

Blockquote

Hello I'm a quote. I clearly need some help.

Adding class text-right aligns right

Technical troubleshooting

Try various browsers, attendees often find better success using Google Chrome. Clear your web browser cache, re-login to the event platform. Make sure you are not blocking cookies in your browser settings during this event – it can affect your ability to access certain features like changing your profile picture or joining a roundtable. Be sure you have closed out of other tabs in your browser for best performance.

Body Copy

Body Copy

What is UC Berkeley Global?

We are the continuing education school of UC Berkeley and bring Berkeley-quality education to our smaller class sizes. We offer everything you need to succeed: rigorous coursework, guidance from expert international student services staff, and events and activities designed to build strong academic and professional networks.

You'll learn from instructors who love teaching and are experienced professionals in their fields. Your classmates come from diverse backgrounds and help create engaging, ever-changing classroom discussions.

We are proud of the community we have created to welcome the bright and ambitious students arriving in Berkeley from all over the globe. Opportunities for personal and career development await you here at our world-renowned university in the San Francisco Bay Area.

—Mariam Rahimi, Admissions Adviser

Student Story

Announcing UC Berkeley Global

One of the key initiatives at UC Berkeley is empowering engaged thinkers and global citizens to change our world. In that sense, global refers to a mindset rather than a geography.

Continue Reading Announcing UC Berkeley Global

Column Section

What is UC Berkeley Global?

We are the continuing education school of UC Berkeley and bring Berkeley-quality education to our smaller class sizes. We offer everything you need to succeed: rigorous coursework, guidance from expert international student services staff, and events and activities designed to build strong academic and professional networks.

You'll learn from instructors who love teaching and are experienced professionals in their fields. Your classmates come from diverse backgrounds and help create engaging, ever-changing classroom discussions.

We are proud of the community we have created to welcome the bright and ambitious students arriving in Berkeley from all over the globe. Opportunities for personal and career development await you here at our world-renowned university in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Welcome to Berkeley

Life shaping. World changing. Future building. That's Berkeley. Imagine yourself here.

Column Section Teal

What is UC Berkeley Global?

We are the continuing education school of UC Berkeley and bring Berkeley-quality education to our smaller class sizes. We offer everything you need to succeed: rigorous coursework, guidance from expert international student services staff, and events and activities designed to build strong academic and professional networks.

You'll learn from instructors who love teaching and are experienced professionals in their fields. Your classmates come from diverse backgrounds and help create engaging, ever-changing classroom discussions.

We are proud of the community we have created to welcome the bright and ambitious students arriving in Berkeley from all over the globe. Opportunities for personal and career development await you here at our world-renowned university in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Welcome to Berkeley

Life shaping. World changing. Future building. That's Berkeley. Imagine yourself here.

Online Programs

Take online programs and courses from anywhere in the world! Receive a Berkeley-quality education from the comfort of your home; students on an F1 visa are not eligible.

Welcome

UC Berkeley Global's Living Styleguide

The style guide primarily acts to establish and maintain consistent design patterns across a project.

It also serves as a communication tool; communicating code and content decisions between the strategists, designers, and developers on a project, communicating content strategy and best practices to stakeholders and content creators, and communicating project progress and design to stakeholders.
